Title: Pending
Description: The award was made and the standstill period, if any, has ended. The contract is not yet concluded (for example, not signed by all parties).
Deprecation note: Deprecated because the same information can be determined by the absence of a `contracts.dateSigned`.

Title: Active
Description: The contract was concluded (for example, signed by all parties). The contract is not yet terminated.
Deprecation note: Deprecated because the same information can be determined by comparing `contracts.period` to `date`.

Title: Terminated
Description: The contract was concluded (for example, signed), and has now come to a close. This might be due to the successful completion of the contract, or might be early termination due to some non-completion.
Deprecation note: OCDS 1.2 replaces this code with a new field for final states.

Title: Cancelled
Description: The contracting process was cancelled by the buyer or the procuring entity (e.g. because of a change in needs, insufficient funds, or technical or procedural errors) after the award was made and the standstill period, if any, had ended.
Deprecation note: OCDS 1.2 replaces this code with a new field for final states.
